Package com.zendesk.maxwell.bootstrap

bootstrapping outputs the current dataset into a stream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BootstrapController
    Watches maxwell.bootstrap, starts and stops bootstrap tasks
    BootstrapTask
    The BootstrapTask class represents a task for bootstrapping a database table and provides methods for creating, manipulating, and matching tasks.
    MaxwellBootstrapUtility
    MaxwellBootstrapUtility is a command line utility that launches and monitors the progress of bootstrapping.
    MaxwellBootstrapUtilityConfig  
    SynchronousBootstrapper
    Does the bulk of the actual bootstrapping work
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
